name: Dream Labyrinth (Demo)
description:
One day in an uncertain future, all the Hololive members are invited to the HQ by 
Yagoo himself for a great celebration, but something bad happens, and now everyone 
is trapped in a weird place, and is up to the Holo EN girls to save the day!

In this demo, you can play either as Calli or Ame as the main character in this RPG game , which consist in going through different mazes, collecting items and equipment, necessary to fight the enemies and free the rest of the Hololive members!

The game is still in development, and it will be possible to play as the other girls as well (Gura, Ina and Kiara) as the MC, plus an extra story after the development of the main game is done! 
The demo version takes more or less to hours of gameplay to totally complete (between the Calli Route and the Ame Route)

The story is totally written by myself, using the "in universe" version of our favorite VTubers. The final version will be different considering the new information and relationships that will be born between the girls as time passes, and I'm currently updating also the graphics.

[Edit:]Here below I leave the credits for the only one illustration that's not mine and the music used for the game, which I don't own any of those tracks credits:
